seo_data.meta_title: 6 Ways To Keep Your Curls Fresh This Summer - Maui Moisture
seo_data.meta_description: Ahh, summer. The unmatched joy of long days in the sun followed by balmy nights in the garden. However, these relaxing summertime moments can come with unpredictable hair days. The summer humidity and harsh sun can be intense on your hair, leaving you feeling more fried than fresh.

seo_data.meta_title: Crunchy Curls? How to Get Crunch-Free Definition - Maui Moisture
seo_data.meta_description: So, you’ve used a hair product to fight the frizz, but now your curls feel crunchy? Don’t worry, your quest for defined curls with natural hair doesn’t have to end there. With the right products and technique, you can find the balance between frizzy and crunchy to achieve soft, bouncy curls worth showing off.

seo_data.meta_title: Frizzy, Dry Hair? It's Not You – It’s the Weather! - Maui Moisture
seo_data.meta_description: Anyone with curly hair knows that when you step outside on a humid day, you get the dreaded frizzy, puffy curls. That’s because the amount of moisture in the air, or lack of, has major implications for your natural texture.Why does this happen —  and how can you prevent it?

seo_data.meta_title: Planning a Protective Style? Here’s What You Need to Know - Maui Moisture
seo_data.meta_description: We get it – as much as you love your natural curls, sometimes it’s fun to change it up. Whether you’re looking for some time off from the daily upkeep of natural hair, trying to encourage hair growth, or just love to change up your look: with the proper care and maintenance, protective styles can be a great way to give your curls a break.

seo_data.meta_title: THE ABCs OF CURL TYPES - Maui Moisture
seo_data.meta_description: Your beautiful curls can be defined and classified in many ways – fine to thick, wavy to coily, low to high porosity – but there’s one system that breaks down your curl type even further. Learn your curl type and how to best care for it to unlock your healthiest, bounciest, most “you” natural texture yet.

seo_data.meta_title: Why You Should Be Using Aloe In Your Hair Routine - Maui Moisture
seo_data.meta_description: You already know aloe vera as a skincare and health ingredient, but did you know that this wonder-plant can work miracles on your hair, too? Aloe has excellent hydrating properties that can quench your parched curls leaving them hydrated, bouncy and shiny. There’s a reason that aloe is our first ingredient in our formulas… read on to find out how we infuse aloe into our hydrating formulas.

seo_data.meta_title: Curl Guide - Maui Moisture
seo_data.meta_description:
Your natural curls deserve natural solutions. That’s why Maui Moisture starts with 100% aloe vera as the first ingredient and is infused with pure coconut water.

Our vegan formulas kick silicones, parabens and sulfated surfactants to the curb so aloe can take center stage. None of the ingredients that dry your curls – just moisture-loving, pure aloe-infused goodness

seo_data.meta_title: Maui Moisture Social Media Sweepstakes - Maui Moisture
seo_data.meta_description: Official Rules NO PURCHASE NECESSARY These Official Rules apply to all sweepstakes conducted via the Maui Moisture brand social media account. Each individual sweepstakes will be announced via a post from Maui Moisture on the applicable social media platform (“Sweepstakes Post”). A Sweepstakes Post will include how to enter, the entry deadline, and the prize(s)/value(s).

seo_data.meta_title: Clarify & Soothe + Black Soap Shampoo - Maui Moisture
seo_data.meta_description: Say hello to this soothing and moisturizing blend that will leave your dry hair feeling and looking healthy! Maui Clarify & Soothe + Black Soap Shampoo for curly hair helps cleanse and remove excess oils while providing much needed hydration. Made with a blend of aloe, black soap, bergamot oil and ginger extract, this shampoo for sensitive scalp cleanses, removes excess oils and provides hydration. It is infused with natural ingredients, including black soap, and helps remove excess oil and promotes healthy-looking hair. You can feel good knowing that this moisturizing shampoo is vegan and not tested on animals, and it is free from mineral oil, silicone, parabens, gluten, SLS, sulfated surfactants, synthetic dyes and ALES.
